roleset.name: to emit air or vapor
roleset.note: EXHALE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'exhale' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from exhale.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: But Clark flied out to short right field and Mitchell 's drive to left was caught [*-1] on the warning track by Rickey Henderson as 62,000 sets of lungs exhaled as one .
